thread.title: Life in an Iranian Dungeon for Being a Tech Expert.

author: Maryam Nayeb Yazdi
title: Life in an Iranian Dungeon for Being a Tech Expert.
text:
Geneva
Kavous Seyed Emami was an Iranian-Canadian environmentalist. Earlier this month Iranian authorities summoned his wife to Evin Prison, showed her his lifeless body hanging in a cell, and told her he had “committed suicide” two weeks after his arrest. Her requests for an independent autopsy were denied.
The news reminded me of another... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
